alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:24AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, south central Wakulla and Franklin Counties through 1130 AM EST/1030 AM CST/... At 1024 AM EST/924 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 11 miles south of Wewahitchka to near Port St. Joe to 21 miles southwest of Mexico Beach. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Beverly, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Hays Place, Fort Gadsden, Nine Mile, Alligator Point, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa and Turkey Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
